self_predictions.prediction_summary: Levan believes he will win decisively, stating Ermes has no chance unless unforeseen circumstances occur.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Levan expects to dominate with his strength and technique.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes believes he has improved significantly and can win, especially if the match goes long.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Ermes plans to use his improved wrist strength and endurance to challenge Levan.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin acknowledges Levan's dominance but highlights the potential for an exciting match if Ermes can challenge him.

Levan Saginashvili.health: Good, but past issues with oxygen and weight
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Dominant performances, but struggled with endurance in long matches.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Very strong, especially in wrist and pronation
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Gave Levan a tough match, showing significant improvement.
